list.title: Greek Geek
list.text: An app to inspire users to do pushups anywhere and track their progress from their phone.
list.description:
An app to inspire users to do pushups anywhere. 

You can use it to set you daily goal and track how much you do in a single day. 

It is possible to add friends and make arenas (groups), where you can see who is winning for most pushups today. You can also check your pushup history and status for each day by months. 

Users must login or register for use of app.

list.title: Food order app
list.text: A front-end app where you can order food online. For mobile only.
list.description:
A front-end app where you can order food online. 
The idea is for user to order food from a nice looking app. 

 You can tap on an item you would like to add and select the quantity. You can choose from different  categories (food or drinks). 

 Users order can be placed after you have added some of the items to the order list, add a credit card and your location.

list.title: Portfolio page
list.text: My portfolio page you are currently viewing.
list.description: I have made my own designs in Figma and coded them to reality with the Vue.js framework, using Firebase as the hosting service.

list.title: Food Check
list.text: A full-stack MEVN app for checking when does the food you have expire.
list.description:
A full-stack MEVN app for checking when does the food you have expire. 

It is currently in the early stages of development. 

It uses Mongoose for connecting Node.js to MongoDB. Uses the MVC software design pattern.. 

A user can save food he has into the app and keep track of when it expires, so he does not throw food away.  

 In the future, the user will be able to register and log in,  have statistics of how much food he has thrown away, be able to put it on to store list and many more things.

list.title: Bucket storage
list.text: A front-end project with mock json server and use of bootstrap.
list.description:
A front-end project with mock json server and use of bootstrap. 

You can create, delete buckets and add files to them. It is using a mock JSON server for http calls.

list.title: Cinema scroll
list.text: A front-end project where I implement infinite scroll for movies.
list.description:
A front-end project where I implement infinite scroll for movies. 

This was a project where I was given a design and did to pixel perfect perfection.

list.title: Hudlajf website
list.text: A website made for a company where I did my internship.
list.description: I was given all the design files and coded the website working closely with the design team, checking back for the best possible outcome.

list.title: Gabi tvoja lepotilnica
list.text: A website for a nails saloon, I am making for a friend.
list.description: I have taken the requests of the client, made the design and now I am coding the website in my spare time.
